DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study investigate depolarization characteristic represent change HyperQ asymptomatic , apparently healthy athletic non-athletic individual . We also aim examine subgroup obese non-obese subject . The goal study establish normal HyperQ value population compare HyperQ value age-matched athletic vs. non-athletic individual similar health status .
